blobs.changelog:
- Improved mode D parser
Add Landis-Gyr E360 old firmware workaround
- Compensate for bug in STAR meters
Add reduced data mode
- Chart.js added to flash
- WiFi scan timeout bug fixed
- mqtt p1ib/state aligned with other sensors

- Home Assistant availiability support (MQTT will/testament)
- Timestamp and firmware upgrade sensor
- Improve LED blinking schema
Remove 'homeassistant/sensor/'-part from MQTT state topics
- 'P1IB' remove from HA sensors friendly name
- Energy export and momentary power export in summary card
- P1ib svg icon header in menus
- Change to correct device class on sensors (note kVArh not supported by HA, will produce varnings)
- Add separate availability topic for telegram received sensor
- Add NTP servers configurable from web ui
- Fix uptime overflow bug
- Custom/hidden Wi-Fi SSID
- Static ip
- Wifi retry and ap-mode timeout setting
- Support for Homey

- Auto detect meter mode
- Changed MQTT auto discovery online state behavior
- Fix wifi scan javascript bug
- Combined import/export sensor
- UI password protection
- Factory reset
